description:
Artwork that has served as the cornerstone of the "NINJA GAIDEN" series, along with numerous BGM tracks that perfectly suit the high-speed action, are all included in one book.

â– A large volume of content, including 70 pages and 180 tracks
In addition to character designs, stage visuals, movies, crayon drawings, head shots, and more are included. This essential Art Book & Soundtrack allows you to listen to your favorite BGM from "NINJA GAIDEN" as you look back on its history.

Note: This product is included in "NINJA GAIDEN: Master Collection Deluxe Edition". It is not available for individual purchase.
name: NINJA GAIDEN: Master Collection Digital Art Book & Soundtrack
intro: A must for "NINJA GAIDEN" fans! A treasure of materials, compiled together!
